channel.title: snap on Dan Aukes
channel.description: Recent content in snap on Dan Aukes

item.title: Preparation
item.description: First, update apt sudo apt update && sudo apt upgrade -y Install Flatpak # install sudo apt install flatpak -y #if you want to install from software GUI sudo apt install gnome-software-plugin-flatpak -y #add the flathub repo flatpak remote-add --if-not-exists flathub https://flathub.

item.title: Removing Firefox and Snap
item.description: This is useful for stalled updates when installing ubuntu-desktop-minimal on a server.
